Articles.Content: Please squad bring back the old crisp textures, the new ones in 1.1 look WAY to cartoonish
That's the point, KSP is not suppose to be that realistic.

Um... What? Could you be more clear. What changed back in 1.1 exactly? What do you mean by crisp? What is wrong with cartoonish? Details man we need details! If you can't put forth the effort then there is no reason for anyone to give this suggestion the time of day.
Not sure what you're talking about. Textures are fine.
1.1 didn't change any existing textures at all.  Not a single one.
Actually, the newest textures (not all of them have updated) are more realistic than the old ones which were pretty bad. Could you clarify?
